item.title: Who Goes Blogging 4.1: Content Structure & Refactoring
item.description: So far in this series we’ve been looking at the infrastructure behind the Hugo website, but I haven’t looked into improving the content layout of the site. Some of the improvements I want to make are: Moving content articles from a flat structure to a leaf bundle Rename content section to blog from posts Upgrading hugo-coder theme and hugo version Adding a table of contents to the pages … and further improvements as I find them This post will cover items 1-2, the others will be in a follow up post.
